attributes.action: reduce his Prime Ministerial wage by £1000 for every penny that the National Average Price of Diesel fuel exceeds £1 a litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of diesel and petrol fuel in the UK is a disgrace and is the result of steath taxation which was introduced by the previous Chancellor (current Prime Minister) and as a result £1000 should be deducted from the Prime Ministerial salary for every penny that the National Average Price of diesel fuel exceeds £1 a litre.
